resource: 1001998.description=Lane Keep Assist is designed to read the lane markers under certain conditions. It provides a visual and audible alert and provides slight steering force when lane departure is detected. It is not a collision-avoidance system or a substitute for safe and attentive driving. Effectiveness depends on many factors. See your Ownerâ€™s Manual for further information. 1001998.vtc=true 1001998.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001998.derived=false
